title: 6.20 Ivern glitch in store

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: The ability name is glitched I think

replies.body:
It definitely is! Thanks for bringing it to our attention. Help us track this by posting it to our [Bug tracking boards.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)

Let me know if you have any questions.
